page.title: 01The Upper Holme Valley
page.content: {Landscape {Hinchliffe Mill}and{Holmbridge}are mostly surrounded by fields and moors.There is a lovely view from {Cartworth Moor}of the area but in Holmbridge there is a horrible red brick estate.All the rest is beautiful,there are fields,moors, houses and our school (called locally Dobb Top Primary School). Most of the people work in Mills or are Farmers on the moors. A lot of Victorian houses have been built on Woodhead Road, the{A6024. There is not much to do in Hinchliffe Mill.There is a brass band that I go to and just down the road there are 2 dams and 1 river with ducks on them. The only place safe to play is the recreation ground with a big playing field, 4 swings and a see saw.
